website_summaries.verdict: Works with most devices and creates attractive pictures and videos.
pros: We love that this light has a bumper that protects devices from damage
Controls are also easy to use and accommodate impromptu photo sessions
cons: Power won't last very long when recording videos

customer_reviews.title: It's such a great little light
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a friends birthday present and had to get one for myself! It's such a great little light. Someone wrote a review saying they couldn't tell when it was done charging- there is a tiny red light on the ring that indicates charging so not sure what their issue was. I love pulling this out when taking pics with my friends, they get so excited about it! Unfortunately it doesn't work on the other side because it blocks the front camera but I still love it and carry it everywhere with me just in case a good pic opportunity arises!
customer_reviews.author: MrsG

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Best light ever!! Has 3 light modes and a blinker option too which is useless but cute. Comes with the USB cord but not charger box which is cool. Charges pretty quick...about 45 min for a full charge if battery is completely gone. The little screw in the back started to come loose but I was able to fix that with a little nail push. Way worth the money. I think I'll buy a few for gifts since my girlfriend all take my light to use on their phones!! Lol
customer_reviews.author: Ajmiller

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Light
customer_reviews.text: Works well with my Samsung S6. I am very pleased with it so far! Have used only a few times. I am very pleased with the brightness levels. I had to press the button a little harder than I expected to switch between brightness levels and to turn off the device, but it's really not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: FloridaGirl15

customer_reviews.title: Bright🔆🔆🔆
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I’ve used this often enough to know how long the batteries will last, but it’s rechargeavle!. Besides that, it’s great for taking photos in dimmed area. Of course it will not work if the phones is at a distant greater than arm length, but will definitely do it in selfies. It’s actually brighter than I thought. Fits well over an iPhone 8 Plus with the Akna case on.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Kim

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t recharge
customer_reviews.text: The lighting was great, for the whole fifteen minutes it worked. It died after that, which was to be expected. Then I plugged it in and every fifteen minutes had to re plug it because the light would go out and I read the manual, it stated the light would go out when full charged (but it still wouldn’t turn on) I thought maybe I got a bad cord with it, so I tried another cord that I know works and still same issue. It’s been on the charger for about 4 hours now and it won’t turn on.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, 3 light settings & rechargeable; Fits great on my iPhone SE
customer_reviews.text: Affordable - $8: Great value for occasional use Functional - 3 light settings Simple - 1 button Rechargeable - USB cord included (however it's very short ;) ) Fits well for both front and back camera on my iPhone SE
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Battery sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The charge on this thing does not last at all. I have another one from a different brand and I don't have to charge it as much as I have to charge this one. I use these for video calls which only last anywhere between 10-20 mins. By the time the call is over the light is so dim. My other one lasts almost a week without charging.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: This Really Works
customer_reviews.text: For the price, you can’t beat this selfie ring light. I bought one for myself and I bought 2 more to give to friends for their birthdays last week. This really does make a difference in the pictures that you take. I’ve used with my forward facing camera and my backward facing camera. I think it works best with the forward facing camera. Every time I use it, people ask me what it is and where did I get it. It’s convenient to carry in my purse and I may get another one with more bells and whistles since I know this type of thing actually makes a difference.
customer_reviews.author: imvalued

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to get this but upon first charge i realized the battery does not work and has to be charged evry single time for use even if you charged the night before and did not use ir wastr the battery. Not recommended. Now i will have to purchase another from another brand and already advised my friends not to order from here either. Bc of that charge issue. Unless i got a bad batch. Idk.. but if u feel the need to wastr yoyr money to test out my theory be my guest
customer_reviews.author: nikki

customer_reviews.title: Look at the pictures
customer_reviews.text: The light was great the first day. After seconds it died and the first two low setting were messed up with black lines showing up on my photos 😩 Update. Light is completely no good. Charger port broke off into the inside part of the light. I do not recommend It never kept a battery life longer than 1 minute
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Great Addition to Your Phone
customer_reviews.text: This has great light and can be charged so no battery changing! Helps photos to look better due to the addition of more light. Easy to carry in purse and clip on your phone when ready to use.
customer_reviews.author: velvetrider

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I was using it for!! I'm a nail tech and needed this for up close pics and it's perfect! I tried to use it for selfie more as well and the effect wasn't the same but I'm only using it for my back camera anyways. I love it Edit: I only had this for 2 days and it already stopped working. Waste of money smh
customer_reviews.author: liyah moore

customer_reviews.title: Do not recommend
customer_reviews.text: I received the selfie light and plugged it into my laptop to charge. Left it charging for about 30 min and started getting a burnt plastic smell. I finally found that the charger wire was burning. So disappointed! I am so glad my laptop didn’t catch on fire. I decided to charge it with another charger plugged to the wall and it only gives me about 5 min of light at a time. Maybe I got a bad one.
customer_reviews.author: HAZEL REYES

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Was not sure how well this would work...but the video tells the story.

customer_reviews.title: Useful

customer_reviews.title: Bought this for copying materials and documentation

Placed it on the charger and the light flickered when I tried to turn it on. Took it off the charger and it still wouldn’t come on. I’m sure it would’ve done wonders had it just been able to cut back on

Not enough light, or the wrong kind of light doesn't give the watcher the true color and effect of what you're using on your face. You cannot beat it for the price!! There's nothing I do not like about it so far. If something comes up, I'll come back and add it to this post.

product_meta.title: LinkStyle Selfie Light, Linkstyle Selfie Ring Light Rechargeable 36 LEDs 3 Level Brightness for iPhone 7/7 Plus 6/6 Plus 6S/6S Plus 5S SE Samsung Galaxy S8/S8 Plus S7 S6 Edge
product_meta.description:
Rechargeable selfie light:
Built-in rechargeable battery with USB cable offer 30% more lightness! Not need extra batteries. 

Universal applicability: 
Available for all types of phones, pads, and any electronics with thickness under 0.59 inch. 

Specifications: 
LED Quantity: 36 PCS 
Weight: 1.5oz/42g 
Color: white 
Lithium Battery: 250mAH - 3.7V 
Max Output: 3W 
Charging Voltage: DC 5V 
Color render index: ?95% 
Color temperature: 5600k 

What's In the Box: 
1*Selfie Ring Light 
1*Charging Cable 
1*User Manual
feature_bullets: Lighten You and Darken Everything Behind You: 36 LED bulbs provides the perfect supplement to natural lighting. Long gone are the days of the flash from your phone taking up half of the photo you took in the bathroom mirror.
Vlog Game Changer: This Selife Light has 3 settings that gradually get brighter as you click the power button. By clip it on front or backward of the phone, you will never miss a great shot!

Never Has Selfie Been So Easy: Clip this selfie light to the inside of your bag or jacket pocket and you’re ready for that selfie in seconds. No searching for batteries, you can simply recharge this selfie ring light with USB cable when light out.

Multi Usage, Work Amazing: Compatible with all smartphones and all types of shoots, from a sharp music video to a portrait of a ladybug. The ring shape helps the light radiate evenly onto your face and scratch resistant sponge around the clip makes sure your phone doesn’t get scratched.

100% GUARANTEE: No more walking round your house trying to get the perfect balance of natural and artificial light, this light is here for you. if this product does not meet your expectation in any way, we guarantee a full refund or a free replacement without hesitation.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars385 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
